name: RI_1_1_14_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Archive_Event
title: RI.1.1.14.1 Evidence of Record Entry Archive Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Archive Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Archive Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.14.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when Record Entry content is archived.

statement.label: RI.1.1.14.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization where Record Entry content is archived.

statement.label: RI.1.1.14.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the patient who is subject of archived Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.14.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture an archive identifier for archived Record Entry content (e.g., nursing home inpatient stay from 3/15/2000 thru 6/10/2000).

statement.label: RI.1.1.14.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the user archiving Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.14.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system application which archived Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.14.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., archive).

statement.label: RI.1.1.14.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time Record Entry content is archived.

statement.label: RI.1.1.14.1#09
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) to which Record Entry content is archived.

statement.label: RI.1.1.14.1#10
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the rationale for archiving Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.14.1#11
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the set of Record Entry content to be archived.

statement.label: RI.1.1.14.1#12
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the data, document or other identifier for archived Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.14.1#13
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture the method and target media of archived Record Entry content.
